id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [lcd_pcf8574 Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/lcd_display.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The [I²C](https://esphome.io/components/i2c.html#i2c) address of the PCF8574 chip, defaults to `0x3F`.

*See also: [lcd_pcf8574 Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/lcd_display.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to re-draw the screen. Defaults to `1s`.

*See also: [lcd_pcf8574 Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/lcd_display.html#configuration-variables)*
